text.jpText:
不調が続くスーパークリーク。世間では、
トレーナーのせいで彼女がレースに
出走できないと、話題になっていた。
text.enText:
Super Creek continues to perform poorly. 
People were talking about how her trainer was 
preventing her from racing. her to run in 
races because of her trainer.

text.jpText:
不満を示したスーパークリークは、
その見解を覆すためにトレーニングに
向かおうとして、体調を崩してしまった。
text.enText:
Super Creek, unhappy, tried to head into 
training to challenge that view. She became 
ill in an attempt to head out for a workout 
to change that view.

text.jpText:
トレーナーは、その様子を見て彼女の不調が
“誰かのために”頑張りすぎてしまうことに
原因があると気が付くのだった。
text.enText:
The trainer saw this and realized that her 
disorder was caused by her trying too hard 
"for someone else. She realized that the 
cause of her disorder was that she was trying 
too hard "for the sake of someone else".
